refnamediv.refpurpose: Tell whether a day is a weekday, weekend or a day that has a transition between the two

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns one of the constants IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKDAY, IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND, IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_OFFSET or IntlCalendar::DOW_TYPE_WEEKEND_CEASE&return.falseforfailure;.
